description: This production-ready dashboard provides full-stack visibility for Golang applications using Echo framework and GORM ORM. Monitor critical application metrics including HTTP performance, memory allocation patterns, garbage collection efficiency, and database connection pooling. Features intelligent Apdex scoring, live request tracing, and resource utilization trends with built-in alert thresholds. Perfect for DevOps teams managing high-performance Golang microservices.

list.description: Variable holding the origin of the data
list.label: Datasource
list.name: datasource

title: Golang (plus Echo, Gorm)
